amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Peer-Reviewed Prostate Cancer Research Program by $16 million offset by a reduction in funding for defense-wide appropriations by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $16,000,000 from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation to the Defense Health Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
